sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useContext } from "react" import styles from './SemesterItem.module.css' import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { faPlus, faEllipsis, faDownLeftAndUpRightToCenter, faUpRightAndDownLeftFromCenter } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' export default function SemesterItem({semester}) { return (
{semester.name} | {semester.season} {semester.year}
10 ECTS
) }
